```{r}
ggplot(data = data) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = Area , y = `NumberCaught Total`, fill = SpeciesGroup, colour = SpeciesGroup), stat = "identity")


```





```{r}
ggplot(data = data) + 
  geom_bar(aes(x = Area, y = `NumberCaught Total`, fill = SpeciesGroup, colour = SpeciesGroup), stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data) + 
  geom_bar(aes(x = Area, y = `NumberCaught Total`, fill = SpeciesGroup, colour = SpeciesGroup), stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)) +
  facet_wrap(~ SpeciesGroup, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(title = "Multiple Bar Graphs of Variables",
       x = "Area",
       y = "NumberCaughtTotal",
       fill = "SpeciesGroup") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))
  theme_minimal()
  
```



```{r}
ggplot(data = data) +
